snippet: Early Sunday afternoon, Marcell Dockery, 16, set a mattress on fire in the hallway of the residential tower at 2007 Surf Avenue in Brooklyn, according to police reports.
abstract: Brooklyn teenager Marcell Dockery tells police boredom led him to set fire to a mattress in his apartment building, starting blaze that critically injured two New York City police officers; is arrested and charged with arson, reckless endangerment and two counts of assault; Police Officers Rosa Rodriguez and Dennis Guerra remain hospitalized in critical condition.
lead_paragraph: Early Sunday afternoon, Marcell Dockery, 16, set a mattress on fire in the hallway of the residential tower at 2007 Surf Avenue in Brooklyn, according to police reports.

headline.main: Teenager Tells Police Boredom Led Him to Start Fire That Injured 2 Officers
headline.print_headline: Teenager Tells Police Boredom Led Him to Start Fire That Injured 2 Officers
